question:
You recently did a short cookery course. The cookery school has asked for your feedback on this course.Write a letter to the course director at the cookery school. 
In your letter,Describe what you enjoyed about the courseSay how muchcooking you've done since the sourcesuggest another cookery course you'd like the school to offer
text: I am writing this letter to express my gratitude towards the course called "The Amazing Chef", which I undertook in the month of June 2022.

Think of the course, I think learning to cook new cuisines, especially a few Italian dishes, each and every day was the best part of the course. On top of it, I have had a great opportunity to meet and interact with a horde of amazing people learning alongside me. Additionally, all of this culminated in great learning.

Because I have a hectic schedule every now and then, I usually cook something special for my family on the weekends, enabling us to have a wonderful time with one another. That being said, I reckon you should also include a cookery course for Indian dishes as well since these are quite popular among our local community.
Furthermore, I can be contacted at my personal email address, which is [email protected]
